Course-name: Basics of Health Promotion and Education Intervention
Course-instructor:
Prof. Arista Lahiri
 Prof. Sweety Suman Jha
 Prof. Chandrasekhar taklikar
 Prof. Madhumita Dobe
content: This course is designed to provide the learners a comprehensive understanding about Health Promotion and Education Interventions. Health Promotion and Education Interventions are key competencies for public health professionals. After completion of this course the participants will be able to define and understand the needs for health promotion and education interventions. The participants will also be able to plan, implement, and evaluate Health Promotion and Education Interventions.
